document_data.name: Aquas and Azures
document_data.mainbody: '''Aquas and Azures''' was an exclusive jeweler's and gemcutter's shop in [[Calimport]] specializing in blue-colored [[gem]]s around [[1370 DR]].<ref name=Calimport-p59 />
document_data.Location: The store was located in [[Calimport/Wizard Ward#Najja Sabban|Mayya Drudach of Najja Sabban]] in [[Wizard Ward]].<ref name=Calimport-p59 />
document_data.Structure: Aquas and Azures was a seven-story minaret tower with no entrance at either the ground level or from the ''[[drudach]]'' or ''[[sabban]]'' wall paths. Instead, the only entrance was high up on the open balcony near the top of the tower. Thus, flying was the only way to enter the shop, and [[Wall of force|''walls of force'']] kept anyone uninvited out (though they did ''not'' trap customers in.)<ref name=Calimport-p59 />
document_data.Services: One was only allowed to peruse the collection of [[sapphire]]s and other blue gemstones by invitation only. If of high enough social status, a potential customer would be delivered an appointment form. At the time of the appointment, a blue ''[[flying carpet]]'' would be sent down to carry the client up to the balcony to enter the store.
document_data.Staff: The shop was owned by a man named [[Melroat]]. He had servants on his staff.<ref name=Calimport-p59 />
